note.item: Please view commit history at Google Code for details.
LiveAlert for alerting at HT Live goals by ryanli.
OldStyleFace for showing faces in old Hattrick style by Aimo_Kanuuna.
NtPeek for peeking NT/U20 matches at My Hattrick by ryanli.
Option to hide forum sneak-peek in FixcssProblems by ljushaff.
New grey icon for report links by ljushaff.
Most features working under Google Chrome.
Some trivial fixes for latest Hattrick changes.
Radio options in ExtraShortcuts are disabled by default.
